channel.title: Word proposals populating at the bottom of the page when typing
channel.description: When typing typically proposals start to populate at the bottom of the page in a number of apps on iOS that can then be used. Is there any setting where this can be configured in Drafts?

item.title: Word proposals populating at the bottom of the page when typing
item.dc:creator: us40489
item.description:
Yes, predictive-text suggestions is what I meant, sorry for the unprecise description.

Read full topic
item.source: Word proposals populating at the bottom of the page when typing

item.title: Word proposals populating at the bottom of the page when typing
item.dc:creator: agiletortoise
item.description:
If you have suggestions in other apps, but not Drafts, check that you did not disable “Autocorrect” in the Aa editor settings screen. Suggestions are part of the iOS autocorrect feature.

Read full topic
item.source: Word proposals populating at the bottom of the page when typing

item.title: Word proposals populating at the bottom of the page when typing
item.dc:creator: sylumer
item.description:
Ah text suggestions. I read it as they were writing proposals.

Read full topic
item.source: Word proposals populating at the bottom of the page when typing

item.title: Word proposals populating at the bottom of the page when typing
item.dc:creator: PhilipK
item.description:
If I’m correct, @us40489’s question is about the predictive-text suggestions which appear above the keyboard when typing. If so, then this is an iOS feature and not part of Drafts.

Read full topic
item.source: Word proposals populating at the bottom of the page when typing

item.title: Word proposals populating at the bottom of the page when typing
item.dc:creator: sylumer
item.description:
I’m not aware of any setting like this. Text is entered from top to bottom and downward scrolling from the draft start.

I’ve seen centralised typewriter modes before in apps, but curiously I’ve never seen a bottom to top implementation.

Read full topic
item.source: Word proposals populating at the bottom of the page when typing
